author: arichardson
title: Barcelona identify Arsenal’s Hector Bellerin as their top transfer target in attempt to finally find Dani Alves replacement
text:
EFL by hec or by crook Barcelona identify Arsenal’s Hector Bellerin as their top transfer target in attempt to finally find Dani Alves replacement 
Luis Enrique's attempts to convert Sergi Roberto to right-back has failed and club will turn to Gunners star as he fits bill Gossip
